com.communote.server.core.blog.export

Interface PermalinkGenerator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultPermalinkGenerator, PermalinkGenerationManagement

    public interface PermalinkGenerator
    Interface for defining generation of permanent links.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String PERMA_ID_NOTES
      The permalink identifier for notes
      static String PERMA_ID_TAGS
      The permalink identifier for tags
      static String PERMA_ID_TOPICS
      The permalink identifier for topics.
      static String PERMA_ID_USERS
      The permalink identifier for users

    • Method Detail

      • extractPermaLinkIdentifier

        String extractPermaLinkIdentifier(String[] uriFragments)
        Get the type of perma link (one of the constants PERMA_ID_TOPICS etc)
        Parameters:
        uriFragments - the splitted uri fragments
        Returns:
        the perma link identifier (that is 'blogs', 'users', 'tags' ...)

      • getBlogLink

        String getBlogLink(String blogAlias)
        Calls getBlogLink(String, boolean) with secure parameter set to false.
        Parameters:
        blogAlias - the alias of the blog to get the link for
        Returns:
        the absolute perma link for the blog

      • getBlogLink

        String getBlogLink(String blogAlias,
                   boolean secure)
        Parameters:
        blogAlias - the alias of the blog to get the link for
        secure - If true https will be used.
        Returns:
        the absolute perma link for the blog

      • getNoteLink

        String getNoteLink(String blogAlias,
                   Long noteId)
        Calls getNoteLink(String, Long, boolean) with secure parameter set to false.
        Parameters:
        blogAlias - the blog alias of the note to get the link for
        noteId - the id of the note to get the link for
        Returns:
        the perma link for the note

      • getNoteLink

        String getNoteLink(String blogAlias,
                   Long noteId,
                   boolean secure)
        Parameters:
        blogAlias - the blog alias of the note to get the link for
        noteId - the id of the note to get the link for
        secure - If true, https will be used.
        Returns:
        the perma link for the note

      • getTagLink

        String getTagLink(long tagId)
        Calls getTagLink(String, boolean) with secure parameter set to false.
        Parameters:
        tagId - The tag to get the link for
        Returns:
        The permanent link for the tag.

      • getTagLink

        String getTagLink(long tagId,
                  boolean secure)
        Parameters:
        tagId - the tag to get the link for
        secure - If true, https will be used.
        Returns:
        the perma link for the tag

      • getTagLink

        @Deprecated
String getTagLink(String tag)
        Deprecated. Use getTagLink(long) instead.
        Calls getTagLink(String, boolean) with secure parameter set to false.
        Parameters:
        tag - The tag to get the link for
        Returns:
        The permanent link for the tag.

        secure - If true, https will be used.
